title: Deathstalker Return
description: Lewis Deathstalker abandoned his place as Paragon and Imperial Champion for the love of Jesmine Flowers, the King's intended. Both have been branded traitors to the Empire and are now traveling in more notorious cicles-- with immoral gladiator Rose Constantine, con man Brett Random, and alien reptiloid Saturday.While Lewis is rooting out Finn Durandal, a real traitor to the Empire, he finds he has a greater threat to face. The Terror that was prophesied to destroy all Humanity is encroaching. Prophecy also dictates that the only one capable of stopping it is a legend who disappeared more than two hundred years ago-- Owen Deathstalker. Now Lewis and his companions embark on a quest to find Owen, who Lewis believes-- must believe-- isn't dead at all...
author: Simon R. Green
